title: Fix short hash resolution in jit issue update --json
description:
Short hash resolution fails when --json flag is used, breaking MCP tools.

Problem: jit issue update ac99db8b --json --state done fails with 'Failed to read file: ac99db8b.json'

Impact:
- MCP tools broken (all use --json)
- Scripting broken
- UX inconsistency
- Documented feature broken

Root cause: Short hash resolution happens AFTER JSON output logic tries to read file.

Fix: Resolve short hashes BEFORE any file I/O operations.
